Text: I sure hope that was troll.
probably not. people who argue about which comic character is best (and why) like it means something don't have a lot between the ears. comics are ENTERTAINMENT zakkie. nothing else.
does the troll know that the creators of his favorite comics are mostly Jews themselves? Kind of selective hate there.

Hey Zakimir ,..You wouldn't happen to be from Iran would you ?

Dipshit.

Guess what , you are not helping anyone but the people you hate.

Have some thought before you speak.

You only further the divide.
